snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 3 - The War Ends and His Journey Begins [Extra Episode] [DLC]
snippet.description:
Valkyria Chronicles 3
Radi Jaeger's Story:
The War Ends and His Journey Begins
October 1935
Mission: "Escape to His Homeland"
Objective: Jaeger reaches designated point
Difficulty: ---
Weapon received: Asgar (semi-auto sniper rifle)

This short DLC tells the events that happened after Squad 7 defeated Jaeger. If we remember, his future was uncertain when he left trying to reach his homeland, Fhirald.

So, I have to make an announcement, this is the last video and won't be making anymore. Just kidding!
I have already finished this game, this opens new content and the possibility of unlocking 2 new characters. The thing is that it seems more appropiate to recruit these units and show their character missions before proceeding to the final episode of this game.
So, I will do the post-game content before uploading the final chapter. I hope this doesn't upset anyone that was eagerly waiting for the final chapter. But this is also exciting because I will be tackling the feared 5-star missions.

Also, the final chapter is divided in two routes: Imca's and Riela's. Let me know in the comments which route would you want to see first.

Thanks for following!
